name: Tyrantrum
description: The Despot Pokémon. Thanks to its gargantuan jaws, which could shred thick metal plates as if they were paper, it was invincible in the ancient world it once inhabited.

abilities.name: Strong Jaw
abilities.description: For biting moves activated by this Pokémon (Bite, Thunder Fang, Crunch, etc.), they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.

abilities.name: Rock Head
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no recoil damage.
